verses.verse: Then Eliashib<WH475> the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548> rose up<WH6965> with his brothers<WH251> the priests,<WH3548> and they built<WH1129> the sheep<WH6629> gate;<WH8179> they sanctified<WH6942> it,<WH5975> and set up its doors;<WH1817> even to the tower<WH4026> of Hammeah<WH3968> they sanctified<WH6942> it,<WH4026> to the tower of Hananel.<WH2606>
Next to him<WH3027> built<WH1129> the men<WH582> of Jericho.<WH3405> Next to them built<WH1129> Zaccur<WH2139> the son<WH1121> of Imri.<WH566>
The sons<WH1121> of Hassenaah<WH5570> built<WH1129> the fish<WH1709> gate.<WH8179> They laid its beams,<WH7136> and set up<WH5975> its doors,<WH1817> its bolts,<WH4514> and its bars.<WH1280>

Next to them,<WH3027> Meremoth<WH4822> the son<WH1121> of Uriah,<WH223> the son<WH1121> of Hakkoz<WH6976> made repairs.<WH2388> Next to them,<WH3027> Meshullam<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Berechiah,<WH1296> the son<WH1121> of Meshezabel<WH4898> made repairs.<WH2388> Next to them,<WH3027> Zadok<WH6659> the son<WH1121> of Baana<WH1195> made repairs.<WH2388>
Next to them,<WH3027> the Tekoites<WH8621> made repairs;<WH2388> but their nobles<WH117> didn't<WH935> put their necks<WH6677> to the work<WH5656> of their lord.<WH113>

Joiada<WH3111> the son<WH1121> of Paseah<WH6454> and Meshullam<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Besodeiah<WH1152> repaired<WH2388> the old<WH3465> gate.<WH8179> They laid its beams,<WH7136> and set up<WH5975> its doors,<WH1817> and its bolts,<WH4514> and its bars.<WH1280>

Next to them,<WH3027> Melatiah<WH4424> the Gibeonite,<WH1393> and Jadon<WH3036> the Meronothite,<WH4824> the men<WH582> of Gibeon,<WH1391> and of Mizpah,<WH4709> repaired<WH2388> the residence<WH3678> of the governor<WH6346> beyond<WH5676> the River.<WH5104>

Next to him,<WH3027> Uzziel<WH5816> the son<WH1121> of Harhaiah,<WH2736> goldsmiths,<WH6884> made repairs.<WH2388> Next to him,<WH3027> Hananiah<WH2608> one<WH1121> of the perfumers<WH7546> made repairs,<WH2388> and they fortified<WH5800> Jerusalem<WH3389> even to the broad<WH7342> wall.<WH2346>
Next to them,<WH3027> Rephaiah<WH7509> the son<WH1121> of Hur,<WH2354> the ruler<WH8269> of half<WH2677> the district<WH6418> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> made repairs.<WH2388>

Next to them,<WH3027> Jedaiah<WH3042> the son<WH1121> of Harumaph<WH2739> made repairs<WH2388> across from his house.<WH1004> Next to him,<WH3027> Hattush<WH2407> the son<WH1121> of Hashabneiah<WH2813> made repairs.<WH2388>

Malchijah<WH4441> the son<WH1121> of Harim,<WH2766> and Hasshub<WH2815> the son<WH1121> of Pahathmoab,<WH6355> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> portion,<WH4060> and the tower<WH4026> of the furnaces.<WH8574>

Next to him,<WH3027> Shallum<WH7967> the son<WH1121> of Hallohesh,<WH3873> the ruler<WH8269> of half<WH2677> the district<WH6418> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> he and his daughters,<WH1323> made repairs.<WH2388>

Hanun<WH2586> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Zanoah<WH2182> repaired<WH2388> the valley<WH1516> gate.<WH8179> They built<WH1129> it,<WH5975> and set up its doors,<WH1817> its bolts,<WH4514> and its bars,<WH1280> and one thousand<WH505> cubits<WH520> of the wall<WH2346> to the dung<WH830> gate.<WH8179>

Malchijah<WH4441> the son<WH1121> of Rechab,<WH7394> the ruler<WH8269> of the district<WH6418> of Beth Haccherem<WH1021> repaired<WH2388> the dung<WH830> gate.<WH8179> He built<WH1129> it,<WH5975> and set up its doors,<WH1817> its bolts,<WH4514> and its bars.<WH1280>

Shallun<WH7968> the son<WH1121> of Colhozeh,<WH3626> the ruler<WH8269> of the district<WH6418> of Mizpah<WH4709> repaired<WH2388> the spring<WH5869> gate.<WH8179> He built<WH1129> it,<WH2926> and covered it,<WH5975> and set up its doors,<WH1817> its bolts,<WH4514> and its bars,<WH1280> and the wall<WH2346> of the pool<WH1295> of Shelah<WH7975> by the king<WH4428>'s garden,<WH1588> even to the stairs<WH4609> that go down<WH3381> from the city<WH5892> of David.<WH1732>

After<WH310> him,<WH5166> Nehemiah the son<WH1121> of Azbuk,<WH5802> the ruler<WH8269> of half<WH2677> the district<WH6418> of Beth Zur,<WH1049> made repairs<WH2388> to the place opposite the tombs<WH6913> of David,<WH1732> and to the pool<WH1295> that was made,<WH6213> and to the house<WH1004> of the mighty men.<WH1368>

After<WH310> him,<WH3881> the Levites, Rehum<WH7348> the son<WH1121> of Bani<WH1137> made repairs.<WH2388> Next to him,<WH3027> Hashabiah,<WH2811> the ruler<WH8269> of half<WH2677> the district<WH6418> of Keilah,<WH7084> made repairs<WH2388> for his district.<WH6418>
After<WH310> him,<WH251> their brothers, Bavvai<WH942> the son<WH1121> of Henadad,<WH2582> the ruler<WH8269> of half<WH2677> the district<WH6418> of Keilah<WH7084> made repairs.<WH2388>

Next to him,<WH3027> Ezer<WH5829> the son<WH1121> of Jeshua,<WH3442> the ruler<WH8269> of Mizpah,<WH4709> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> portion,<WH4060> across from the ascent<WH5927> to the armory<WH5402> at the turning of the wall.<WH4740>

After<WH310> him,<WH1263> Baruch the son<WH1121> of Zabbai<WH2079> earnestly<WH2734> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> portion,<WH4060> from the turning<WH4740> of the wall to the door<WH6607> of the house<WH1004> of Eliashib<WH475> the high<WH1419> priest.<WH3548>

After<WH310> him,<WH4822> Meremoth the son<WH1121> of Uriah<WH223> the son<WH1121> of Hakkoz<WH6976> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> portion,<WH4060> from the door<WH6607> of the house<WH1004> of Eliashib<WH475> even to the end<WH8503> of the house<WH1004> of Eliashib.<WH475>
After<WH310> him,<WH3548> the priests, the men<WH582> of the Plain<WH3603> made repairs.<WH2388>

After<WH310> them,<WH1144> Benjamin and Hasshub<WH2815> made repairs<WH2388> across from their house.<WH1004> After<WH310> them,<WH5838> Azariah the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah<WH4641> the son<WH1121> of Ananiah<WH6055> made repairs<WH2388> beside<WH681> his own house.<WH1004>

After<WH310> him,<WH1131> Binnui the son<WH1121> of Henadad<WH2582> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> portion,<WH4060> from the house<WH1004> of Azariah<WH5838> to the turning<WH4740> of the wall,<WH6438> and to the corner.

Palal<WH6420> the son<WH1121> of Uzai<WH186> made repairs opposite the turning<WH4740> of the wall,<WH4026> and the tower that stands out<WH3318> from the upper<WH5945> house<WH1004> of the king,<WH4428> which is by the court<WH2691> of the guard.<WH4307> After<WH310> him Pedaiah<WH6305> the son<WH1121> of Parosh made repairs.<WH6551>
(Now the Nethinim<WH5411> lived<WH3427> in Ophel,<WH6077> to the place over against the water<WH4325> gate<WH8179> toward the east,<WH4217> and the tower<WH4026> that stands out.<WH3318>)
After<WH310> him the Tekoites<WH8621> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> portion,<WH4060> over against the great<WH1419> tower<WH4026> that stands out,<WH3318> and to the wall<WH2346> of Ophel.<WH6077>
Above the horse<WH5483> gate,<WH8179> the priests<WH3548> made repairs,<WH2388> everyone<WH376> across<WH5048> from his own house.<WH1004>

After<WH310> them,<WH6659> Zadok the son<WH1121> of Immer<WH564> made repairs<WH2388> across from his own house.<WH1004> After<WH310> him,<WH8098> Shemaiah the son<WH1121> of Shecaniah,<WH7935> the keeper<WH8104> of the east<WH4217> gate<WH8179> made repairs.<WH2388>

After<WH310> him,<WH2608> Hananiah the son<WH1121> of Shelemiah,<WH8018> and Hanun<WH2586> the sixth<WH8345> son<WH1121> of Zalaph,<WH6764> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> portion.<WH4060> After<WH310> him,<WH4918> Meshullam the son<WH1121> of Berechiah<WH1296> made repairs<WH2388> across from his room.<WH5393>

After<WH310> him,<WH4441> Malchijah one<WH1121> of the goldsmiths<WH6885> to the house<WH1004> of the Nethinim,<WH5411> and of the merchants,<WH7402> made repairs<WH2388> over against the gate<WH8179> of Hammiphkad,<WH4663> and to the ascent<WH5944> of the corner.<WH6438>
Between the ascent<WH5944> of the corner<WH6438> and the sheep<WH6629> gate,<WH8179> the goldsmiths<WH6884> and the merchants<WH7402> made repairs.<WH2388>
